subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Exoactive of {{och-l|取|to take; to obtain; to collect; to fetch}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Compare the etymology of {{zh-l|*嫁}}.

In {{cog|nan|-}}, the vernacular reading is instead from {{zh-l|𤆬|chhōa|to lead; to guide}}.
